titles.title: It Is A Good Thing To Give Thanks Unto The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice in the Lord, lift up your heart and sing,
Rejoice in the Lord, always.
Blessed is the man who makes the Lord his choice,
Rejoice in the Lord, and again I say rejoice!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It is a good thing to give thanks unto the Lord,
It is a good thing to give thanks unto the Lord,
And to sing praises unto Thy name, Lord Most High.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come, let us sing unto the Lord,
Let us make a joyful noise to the Rock,
To the Rock of our salvation,
Let us come before His presence with thanksgiving
And make a joyful noise.
